General.Name: PAKERS.Co.Ltd
General.Description: PAKERS.Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic component in South Korea and internationally. It offers industrial and residential lightings, and light emitting diode (LED) lighting products, as well as printing equipment parts, including rollers, blades, and other parts of cartridges. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Cheonan-si, South Korea.

1.Name: Hyun-Woo  Lee
1.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Gen. Mang. of Manufacturing Department
